value.name: Family identifies man killed by sheriff's deputy
value.description: Lawrence County Sheriff Gene Mitchell said deputies told the man to put the weapon down, which he refused to do. They say he then charged the deputies, at which point they shot and killed him. Family members identified the man as Shane Watkins, and said he ...

value.name: Lawrence Co. deputy to remain on job following fatal shooting
value.description: LAWRENCE COUNTY, AL (WAFF) - A Lawrence County Sheriff's Deputy ... Authorities are not releasing the name of the man the deputy shot, but the family has identified him as Shane Watkins. The family says that Watkins and anther family member got into ...
